trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema" /> class represents the schema partition for a particular domain.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema" /> representa a partição do esquema para um domínio específico.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the managed resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema" /> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos gerenciados usados pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema" /> e libera, opcionalmente, os recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: The `disposing` parameter affects only the release of managed resources.
trans-unit.target: O `disposing` parâmetro afeta somente a versão de recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Unmanaged resources are always released by this method.
trans-unit.target: Sempre são liberados de recursos não gerenciados por esse método.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all Active Directory Domain Services classes in the schema.
trans-unit.target: Recupera todas as classes do Active Directory Domain Services no esquema.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all Active Directory Domain Services classes in the schema.
trans-unit.target: Recupera todas as classes do Active Directory Domain Services no esquema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects for the classes that were retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> para as classes que foram recuperadas.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> members that identifies which type of classes to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Um dos membros <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> que identifica qual tipo de classes recuperar.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all Active Directory Domain Services classes in the schema that are of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Recupera todas as classes do Active Directory Domain Services no esquema que são do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects for the classes that were retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> para as classes que foram recuperadas.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all of the defunct Active Directory Domain Services classes in the schema.
trans-unit.target: Recupera todas as classes do Active Directory Domain Services expiradas no esquema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects for the classes that were retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> para as classes que foram recuperadas.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all of the defunct Active Directory Domain Services properties in the schema.
trans-unit.target: Recupera todas as propriedades do Active Directory Domain Services expiradas no esquema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects for the properties that were retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> para as propriedades que foram recuperadas.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all of the Active Directory Domain Services properties in the schema.
trans-unit.target: Recupera todas as propriedades do Active Directory Domain Services no esquema.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all of the Active Directory Domain Services properties in the schema.
trans-unit.target: Recupera todas as propriedades do Active Directory Domain Services no esquema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects for the properties that were retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> para as propriedades que foram recuperadas.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.PropertyTypes" /> members that identifies which type of properties to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Um dos membros <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.PropertyTypes" /> que identifica qual tipo de propriedades recuperar.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all of the Active Directory Domain Services properties in the schema of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Recupera todas as propriedades do Active Directory Domain Services no esquema do tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects for the properties that were retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> para as propriedades que foram recuperadas.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The LDAP display name of the class to find.
trans-unit.target: O nome de exibição LDAP da classe a ser localizada.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Recupera a classe com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object that represents the class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que representa a classe com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: A class with the specified name cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível localizar uma classe com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is zero length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> tem tamanho zero.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The common name of the defunct class to find.
trans-unit.target: O nome comum da classe expirada a ser localizada.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the defunct class that has the specified common name.
trans-unit.target: Recupera a classe expirada que tem o nome comum especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object that represents the class with the specified common name.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The common name of the defunct property to find.
trans-unit.target: O nome comum da propriedade expirada a ser localizada.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the defunct property that has the specified common name.
trans-unit.target: Recupera a propriedade expirada que tem o nome comum especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> object that represents the property.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> que representa a propriedade.

trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The LDAP display name of the property to find.
trans-unit.target: O nome de exibição LDAP da propriedade a ser localizada.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o registro da propriedade com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> object that represents the property with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> que representa a propriedade com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema object for the forest that the currently logged-on user is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de esquema para a floresta da qual o usuário conectado no momento é membro.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema" /> object that represents the schema for the domain that the local computer is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema" /> que representa o esquema para o domínio do qual o computador local é membro.

trans-unit.source: A connection to the local domain cannot be made.
trans-unit.target: Não foi possível fazer uma conexão com o domínio local.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the directory partition.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa a partição de diretório.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the directory partition.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa a partição de diretório.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de demanda: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> que contém o destino e as credenciais a serem usados para recuperar o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The target of the context must be a forest, directory server, or configuration set.
trans-unit.target: O destino do contexto deve ser uma floresta, um servidor de diretório ou um conjunto de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the schema object for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o objeto de esquema para o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema" /> object that represents the schema for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema" /> que representa o esquema para o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: A connection to the target specified in <paramref name="context" /> cannot be made.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível estabelecer uma conexão com o destino especificado em <paramref name="context" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> é inválido.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema cache on the client computer.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o cache de esquema no computador cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema master role owner.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o proprietário da função do mestre de esquema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer" /> object that represents the server that is the schema master.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer" /> objeto que representa o servidor que é o mestre de esquema.

trans-unit.source: The current object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual foi descartado.
